name: Terranian
description:
A small open world tower defense game, roam the world and gather resources to build turrets to protect your crashed spaceship, or use the resources to repair your vessel and escape the surface of this hostile planet.

WASD - movement controls
Shift - increase speed
Q/E - cycle weapons
Space - fire handgun
Left mouse - select/build turrets
Right mouse - harvest resources
Esc - deselect/exit built mode
